definition: A visual perception or the act of seeing something, often used to describe the act of observing or taking in the appearance of a person, object, or scene. It is commonly used to refer to the initial impression or visual impact that something or someone makes on an individual.

examples.german: Der Anblick des Sonnenuntergangs war atemberaubend.
examples.english: The sight of the sunset was breathtaking.

examples.german: Der Anblick der Berge war beeindruckend.
examples.english: The view of the mountains was impressive.

examples.german: Der Anblick des Meeres beruhigte meine Seele.
examples.english: The sight of the sea calmed my soul.

examples.german: Der Anblick des Neugeborenen erfüllte die Eltern mit Freude.
examples.english: The sight of the newborn filled the parents with joy.

examples.german: Der Anblick der Blumenwiese zauberte ein Lächeln auf mein Gesicht.
examples.english: The view of the flower meadow brought a smile to my face.
